Title: Relates to eliminating daylight saving time; repealer

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, in relation to eliminating daylight saving time; to amend the public service law, in relation to daylight saving time; and to repeal section 2-106 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating thereto
